embed.description: Follow the steps below to provide us with enough information to help:

fields.name: Please ensure you are using EssentialsX version 2.19.1 or later.
fields.value: You may download the latest builds [here](https://essentialsx.net/downloads.html)

fields.name: Give the link!
fields.value: Paste the links here or DM <@397535955789283329> if you wish to make it private.
